gat_reduced_ads.title: Remove Obtrusive ADS
gat_reduced_ads.description: Eliminates the ADS at the top of all the menus and those before and after games.

gat_all_races.title: Unlock All Races
gat_all_races.description: Unlocks all the races giving you access to 25 new creatures and 20 new towers.

gat_multiple_races.title: Unlock Race Combinations
gat_multiple_races.description: Unlocks the ability to play as more than one race at once. Also unlocks 12 new creatures and 12 new towers.

gat_special_100.title: Purchase 100 of each special
gat_special_100.description: Gives you 100 of each of the race specials.

gat_upgrade_all.title: Upgrade every tower/creature for all races
gat_upgrade_all.description: Boosts the level of each ability for EVERY creature/tower by 1.

gat_upgrade_onerace.title: Upgrade every tower/creature for one race
gat_upgrade_onerace.description: Boosts the level of each ability for all creatures/towers in one race by 1.

gat_upgrade_abilities.title: Upgrade all player and race abilities
gat_upgrade_abilities.description: Boosts the level by 1 of all the player stats and race stats.

gat_double_experience.title: Double Your Experience
gat_double_experience.description: Instantly gives you 2X your current experience level in each race.
